thread.title: The Waters Project
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by The Waters Project

author: The Waters Project
title: The Waters Project
text: Had a great experience on all levels. My sales agent, navigating the website, the follow up, the interaction and depth of detail and attention on every aspect of my production was bullet proof easy. The final product came out great and the follow thru connectivity to all aspects of distribution and networking is way ahead of my expectations. A great partner in my musical productions. Thanks !! David Lee Waters
